title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap (Premium)
description:
As part of Teams Premium, Intelligent Meeting
Recap is a comprehensive AI-powered meeting recap experience that helps users
catch-up, recall, and follow-up on hour-long meetings in minutes by providing recording
and transcription playback with AI assistance. This allows users to browse the
recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes,
action Items, and @mentions.
